Description: Pen case made of brass with a scroll pattern in relief (with associated ink bottle, Af1892,0216.20.b)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995, London, Crafts Council, African Metals
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Acquisition notes: 1892,0216.1 to 28 is a miscellaneous group of material given by A W Franks. Most is European; nos 20 and 21 are the only pieces from Africa.
